##User instructions

Choose the "App" tab (above).

Select a distribution: Normal, Uniform, Exponential or Poisson - default is Normal.

Select the number of trials (samples) - default is 500.

Select the population size - default is 500.

Hit "Submit" button.

##Notes
The parameters used for the distributions were selected to produce a mean and standard deviation of 1, to make it easier for students to compare the sample mean distributions.

Normal distribution: mean=1, standard deviation=1.

Uniform distribution: min=1-$\sqrt{12}$, max=1+$\sqrt{12}$.

Exponential distribution: rate=1.

Poission distribution: $\lambda$=1.
